00002 /*! zgsmatrix*_zcovector operator */
00003 inline _zcovector operator*(const zgsmatrix& mat, const _zcovector& vec)
00004 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00006   if(mat.n!=vec.l){
00007     ERROR_REPORT;
00008     std::cerr << "These matrix and vector can not make a product." << std::endl
00009               << "Your input was (" << mat.m << "x" << mat.n << ") * (" << vec.l << ")." << std::endl;
00010     exit(1);
00011   }
00012 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00013   
00014   zcovector newvec(mat.m);
00015   newvec.zero();
00016   
00017   for(std::vector<zcomponent>::const_iterator it=mat.data.begin(); it!=mat.data.end(); it++){
00018     newvec(it->i) += it->v*vec(it->j);
00019   }
00020   
00021   vec.destroy();
00022   return _(newvec);
00023 }
